entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value is already being tracked for optional relationships are not automatically deleted #33610
  • Don't repeat joins when using multiple Selects in a custom projection on the same entity #33608
  • Combining using OrderBy on property that was resolved using ternary operator. #33607
  • Issue with retrieving migrations in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools 8.0.1 and above #33606
  • Discriminator columns are created in Snapshot for wrongly configured TPC mapping strategy #33605
  • Migrations: Inconsistency between migration and Script-DbContext when adding a required string property. #33604
  • Many-To-Many relation migration generated more Id & Foreign Key #33603

Closed

  • Test ordering issue #33590
  • System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. #33596
  • Query optimization issue when using interceptors that filter Nullable<> fields #33599
  • Error "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using .ToJson in MySql.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.0 #33602

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove temporary properties created by ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention if they aren't used. #33611

Merged

  • [SMALL/TEST ONLY] Fix to #33590 - Test ordering issue #33609
  • disabling flaky cosmos test #33601
